title: AI Safety and Ethical Considerations in the Age of AI

segments.speaker: creator
segments.line: As we continue to advance our understanding of artificial intelligence (AI), it's important to consider the ethical implications that arise from these advancements. In this episode, we will explore how AI systems can progress beyond human control and discuss some potential risks and challenges associated with such an outcome.
